item.title: ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ Victim Says the Door’s Open for a Comeback: “Never Say Never”
item.description: Speaking with The Hollywood Reporter, the actor breaks down that deadly final moment while reminiscing on his integral part in the serial killer franchise.

item.title: Latest ‘Dexter’ Victim Teases Another Resurrection: “I Wouldn’t Count Anything Out”
item.description: The latest casualty on ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ might not be as dead as it appears, based on what the actor tells THR: “We’re keeping our fingers crossed.”

item.title: ‘Dexter: Resurrection’ Victim Speaks Out: “It Was a Striking Visual I’ll Remember For Some Time”
item.description: The Hollywood Reporter speaks with the latest high-profile casualty all about dying inside of Michael C. Hall’s killing room.
